title: Salesman's Sample Book, 1784
medium:
Medium: marbleized paper, cardboard, cotton, linen 
Technique: plain weave, twill weaves, float weaves (damask), supplementary weft pile (velveteen); 108 examples are block-printed
inscribed: Ex HB or FB N5 (?) & Co 18 Mrch 1784
dimensions:
H x W (closed): 24.8 x 16.5 cm (9 3/4 x 6 1/2 in.)
H x W (open): 24.8 x 259.1 cm (9 3/4 in. x 8 ft. 6 in.)
H x W (each swatch): 2.5 x 4.1 cm (1 x 1 5/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Samuel W. Bridgham
description: 461 swatches of fabric pasted on cards arranged in an accordion fold book. Manufacturer's number on each swatch. Book covered in marbleized paper. Samples are either cotton warp and cotton weft or linen warp and cotton weft, some block-printed in small scale repeating patterns.

exhibitions.title: Multiple Choice: From Sample to Product

tombstone.epitaph:
Salesman's Sample Book, 1784.
1784. Medium: marbleized paper, cardboard, cotton, linen 
Technique: plain weave, twill weaves, float weaves (damask), supplementary weft pile (velveteen); 108 examples are block-printed. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. Samuel W. Bridgham. 1950-91-1.
